select_menu.name: Braised fowl with dangerously potent wine-drenched apples from cursed orchards
Spiced rutabaga from the dark Sarkash soil, a delicacy of questionable provenance
Galgenbeckian stew with whole embryonic boars most delectable and disturbing
Tveland yam hash garnished with slices of pungent tomb-truffle
Migol's infamous pie (blackened venison swimming in chicken bone broth jelly)
Black soup served with baked hog's face, eyes still staring

budget_menu.name: Watery femur soup - the bone is large and hath been festering there a considerable while
Thick ooze soup! At least one chunk. The ooze is pure, I assure you!
Sour celery pudding with a side of compressed last-week's-meat
Gloomberry mix (Toughness DR12 to avoid explosive diarrhea)
"Goblin's gall", famous swamp-mud broth. Sourced from local swamps!
Baked staring-pig-head with filled whispering-lips. Most won't touch it.
Chunky stew and hearty ale (Lotta Gravy's specialty)
Galgenburger (mystery meat, may turn you into a zombie)

metadata.usage: Select menu (4s) or budget menu (2s) for tavern meals
